item.title: By: @jimwolffman
item.dc:creator: @jimwolffman
item.description:
Great post Fergus.. Thanks for bringing that to attention.
As usual, Fred Wilson is right on the money, not just spotting the trends, but explaining why they're valuable, engaging and ultimately business-worthy.
item.content:encoded:
Great post Fergus.. Thanks for bringing that to attention.

As usual, Fred Wilson is right on the money, not just spotting the trends, but explaining why they’re valuable, engaging and ultimately business-worthy.
